text: Ju Gau-jeng (; 6 October 1954 â€“ 22 October 2021) was a Taiwanese politician. He was in the Legislative Yuan from 1987 to 1999. He was a member of the Democratic Progressive Party. Ju was born in Yunlin County, Taiwan. Ju died on 22 October 2021 in Taipei, Taiwan from colorectal cancer, two weeks after his 67th birthday. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Taiwanese politicians Category:Deaths from colorectal cancer
title: Ju Gau-jeng
